attributes.action: After 43 years surely now is the time to lift the embargo on Northern Cyprus
attributes.additional_details:
The Republic of Cyprus government stated at Crans-Montana that they would “never treat Turkish Cypriots as equal human beings” and that they would continue to preach ENOSIS to the children in the South. 
The UN and the EU now know the Greek Cypriots never had any intention whatsoever of doing a deal with the Turkish Cypriots, except on THEIR terms. See web link http://www.independent.co.uk/voices/cyrpus-turkish-greek-cypriots-partition-eu-international-community-should-act-a7976711.html
attributes.background: For over 40 years North Cyprus has endured internationally imposed embargoes denying them any of the rights enjoyed by the South leaving them completely isolated from the rest of the world.The embargoes have no authority via any UN Security Council Resolution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the UK Government to lift its embargo on Northern Cyprus, if that's what you would like to happen. Alternatively, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge the UN or the EU to take action.
